message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the behavior of different substances in the presence of heat. When heat is applied, substances like a piece of gum, a slurpy at the cafeteria, and an ice cream cone will all melt or change their physical state. However, a large metamorphic rock will not be affected by heat and will remain the same. Therefore, option (D) is the correct answer. Options (A), (B), and (C) are incorrect because they do not accurately describe the behavior of substances in the presence of heat.

This question requires basic knowledge about the behavior of different materials in the presence of heat. When exposed to heat, a piece of gum will melt, a slurpy at the cafeteria will become liquid, and an ice cream cone will melt. However, a large metamorphic rock will not be affected by heat as it is a solid and does not undergo any changes in response to temperature. Therefore, option (D) is the correct answer.
